snippet.title: Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital - Official Launch Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Be the Best Vet Yet!

Take care of 18 lovable breeds of pups and kittens. Play 20 different mini-games to find out what's wrong and get your playful patients back on their four paws! 

These adorable pets aren’t feeling well, so let's give them the care they need! Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital is a simulation game in which you can have a dream job taking care of cute, fluffy friends.

For more information on the game and to pre-order visit our website here:
http://www.aksysgames.com/animalhospital/

About Aksys Games
One of the Top 10 Metacritic Publishers of 2020, Aksys Games Localization, Inc. is a visionary video game publisher committed to publishing unique and high-quality interactive content for all current-generation platforms since 2006. Its lineup of games includes the wildly successful BlazBlue, Under Night In-Birth, and Guilty Gear franchises, Little Dragons Café, the award-winning Spirit Hunter: Death Mark and Spirit Hunter: NG adventures and Code: Realize titles. More information about Aksys Games and its unique products can be found on the company’s website, www.aksysgames.com.
